column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)
Tindak Malaysia (2024). Refer to Detailed Source/Explanation section of this metadata file for detailed source background for 1974 State Election Results.

There are missing gaps for candidate age data. There could be inaccuracies on who lost deposits for the elections. Refer to MALAYSIA_1974_DUN_DISCLAIMERS file for more detailed explanation for discrepancies. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives

column1: Warta Kerajaan Seri Paduka Baginda 20 August 1974
Warta Kerajaan Seri Paduka Baginda 3 October 1974
Penyata Pilihanraya Umum Dewan Rakyat dan Dewan Undangan Negeri bagi Negeri-Negeri Tanah Melayu dan Sarawak Tahun 1974

column2: FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
State Name
Parliamentary Constituency Code (1974 - 1984 (for Peninsular Malaysia), 1968 - 1977 (for Sarawak))
Parliamentary Constituency Name (1974 - 1984 (for Peninsular Malaysia), 1968 - 1977 (for Sarawak))
State Constituency Code (1974 - 1984 (for Peninsular Malaysia), 1968 - 1977 (for Sarawak))
State Constituency Name (1974 - 1984 (for Peninsular Malaysia), 1968 - 1977 (for Sarawak))
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using 1974 Elections Electoral Roll
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
